work.description: Developed a social media strategy to increase online visibility of various clients. Managed social media & created creative content for daily postings. Design & development of client websites. Graphic design for digital & print. Designing logo & brand identity. Working with various clients from different industries.

work.description: Responsible for managing employee records, processing payroll, and administering various HR and Office tasks. I maintaining accurate employee data, handling timekeeping and attendance systems, assisting with benefits administration, and ensuring compliance with labor laws and company policies.

testimonials.text: Cynthia knew exactly what we wanted! Our website looks amazing and the turn around time was really quick.
Thanks to Cynthia, most of our customers visit our store via Social Media.
